body:
Republican presidential candidate Rick Perry, the former Texas governor, will drop out of the 2016 race, the Associated Press said on Friday, citing unnamed sources.

 (Reporting by Emily Stephenson; Editing by Sandra Maler)
description: (Reuters) - Republican presidential candidate Rick Perry, the former Texas governor, will drop out of the 2016 race, the Associated Press said on Friday, citing unnamed sources.
title: Republican presidential candidate Perry to drop out of race: AP
